00011 #include "McEnergyOutput.h"                  
00012 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/mc_potentials.h> // include all MC potentials
00013 #include <mcMd/util/FileMaster.h>
00014 #include <util/format/Dbl.h>
00015 
00016 namespace McMd
00017 {
00018 
00019    using namespace Util;

00021    // Constructor
00022    McEnergyOutput::McEnergyOutput(McSystem& system) :
00023       SystemDiagnostic<McSystem>(system)
00024    {}
00025 
00026    void McEnergyOutput::readParam(std::istream& in)
00027    {
00028       readInterval(in);
00029       readOutputFileName(in);
00030       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00031    }
00032  
00033    // Evaluate energy and print.
00034    void McEnergyOutput::sample(long iStep) 
00035    {
00036       if (isAtInterval(iStep)) {
00037          double energy = 0.0;
00038          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00039          double pair = system().pairPotential().energy();
00040          outputFile_ << Dbl(pair);
00041          energy += pair;
00042          #endif
00043          double bond = system().bondPotential().energy();
00044          outputFile_ << Dbl(bond);
00045          energy += bond;
00046          #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00047          if (system().hasAnglePotential()) {
00048             double angle = system().anglePotential().energy();
00049             outputFile_ << Dbl(angle);
00050             energy += angle;
00051          }
00052          #endif
00053          #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00054          if (system().hasDihedralPotential()) {
00055             double dihedral = system().dihedralPotential().energy();
00056             outputFile_ << Dbl(dihedral);
00057             energy += dihedral;
00058          }
00059          #endif
00060          #ifdef MCMD_LINK
00061          if (system().hasLinkPotential()) {
00062             double link = system().linkPotential().energy();
00063             outputFile_ << Dbl(link);
00064             energy += link;
00065          }
00066          #endif
00067          #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00068          if (system().hasExternalPotential()) {
00069             double external = system().externalPotential().energy();
00070             outputFile_ << Dbl(external);
00071             energy += external;
00072          }
00073          #endif
00074          #ifdef INTER_TETHER
00075          double tether = system().tetherPotential().energy();
00076          outputFile_ << Dbl(tether);
00077          energy += tether;
00078          #endif
00079          outputFile_ << Dbl(energy) << std::endl;
00080       }
00081    }
00082  
00083    /* 
00084    * Summary
00085    */
00086    void McEnergyOutput::output() 
00087    {
00088       // Close *.dat file
00089       outputFile_.close();
00090 
00091       // Open and write summary file
00092       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00093       writeParam(outputFile_);
00094       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00095       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00096 
00097       outputFile_ << "File format:" << std::endl;
00098       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00099       outputFile_    << "[pair]       ";
00100       #endif
00101       outputFile_    << "[bond]       ";
00102       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00103       if (system().hasAnglePotential()) {
00104          outputFile_ << "[angle]      ";
00105       }
00106       #endif
00107       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00108       if (system().hasDihedralPotential()) {
00109          outputFile_ << "[dihedral]   ";
00110       }
00111       #endif
00112       #ifdef MCMD_LINK
00113       if (system().hasLinkPotential()) {
00114          outputFile_ << "[link]       ";
00115       }
00116       #endif
00117       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00118       if (system().hasExternalPotential()) {
00119          outputFile_ << "[external]   ";
00120       }
00121       #endif
00122       #ifdef INTER_TETHER
00123       outputFile_   << "[tether]     ";
00124       #endif
00125       outputFile_    << "[potential]  ";
00126       outputFile_    << std::endl;
00127 
00128       outputFile_.close();
00129    }
00130    
00131 }
